data.title: Phillips Exeter Academy
data.meta_description: Our Harkness approach to learning, based on discussion and student-centered teaching, pervades every aspect of life at Exeter, where goodness and knowledge go hand in hand.
data.text:
Congratulations, Class of 2024

Exeter celebrates 243rd commencement ceremony.

'You will always belong here' Watch the Ceremony

Need-blind admissions

We admit students without regard for their ability to pay the tuition and we meet 100% of the demonstrated need of every admitted student.

Learn More

Nearly 50% of our students receive financial aid.

Families earning less than $75,000 pay no tuition.

A family's ability to pay the tuition is not a factor for admission.

We meet 100% of the demonstrated need of every admitted student.

Our class size is 12 students and one teacher.

200+ faculty support students. The student/teacher ratio is 6:1.

Students come from 45 states and 37 countries.

To share experiences in one vibrant community.

26 dorms of all sizes. One family.

Where every student forms connections that last a lifetime.

"There are people around me, resources around me that I can tap into."

E.J.

“I love my friends and my peers here. I think I’ve made friends here that I will have for the rest of my life.”

Polly

“There are so many passionate people and so many great leaders in our class. I’m really excited to see what we can do in the future.”

Maxwell

"Everyone in my class cares a lot about how they impact other people."

Anne

"My friends have made so much more of an impact on my life than they think."

Akili

Where every voice matters.

Harkness is a student-driven approach to learning, created here in 1930. Its impact transforms lives.

Learn About Harkness

Rising to the challenge.

Exeter has adopted an ambitious sustainability and climate action plan.

Read Our Climate Action Plan

Serving others becomes second nature.

Exeter’s motto, non sibi, means not for self. These are words we live by every day.

See Exonians in Action

Find yourself at Exeter.

Join a vibrant community where curiosity is encouraged and opportunity abounds.

Visit Our Campus How to Apply
